mapper.sql: ID, NAME, ACCOUNT, MOBILE, EMAIL, PASSWORD, LAST_PASSWORD_RESET_DATE, IS_DELETE, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME, UPDATE_USER
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from user_tab
order by ${orderByClause}

update user_tab
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
